message: The OTHER_DOC field for indicator 15-3-1, translated into en
data:
Decree No. 60/2018/ND-CP dated April 20, 2018 promulgating the national statistical reporting regime

- Circular No. 03/2019/TT-BKHƒêT dated January 22, 2019 stipulating the set of statistical indicators for sustainable development of Vietnam;

- National report in 2020 on 5-year progress towards implementation of sustainable development goals;
